title: One-pot roast chicken
description: The oven can do the work, while you put your feet up

ingredients.details: baby turnips, marrows, parsnips etc., peeled and cut into chunks

instructions: Preheat oven to 190˚C fan / 170˚C gas mark 5.
Place poussin in a roasting tray and surround with the vegetables. Pour over the stock and wine.
Tuck thyme in the vegetables and on the poussin. Dot the butter over the poussin and season well.
Roast for 45 minutes or until the juices run clear. Remove the poussin and wrap in foil.
Place the vegetables in a new tray and keep warm.
Place the original baking tray over a medium heat on the hob and bring the juices to the boil. Add cream and stir to combine. Strain and pour into a warm jug.
Serve immediately with the chicken and vegetables.
imageDesc: A roasted chicken with vegetables, served in a copper pan
